bibl.title: Persian and Ptolemaic Ceramics from Karnak: Change and Continuity.
bibl.note: Common elements of both periods in the local pottery. - Some characteristics of Late Period ceramics (local production). - Some characteristics of the Ptolemaic ceramics (local productions). - The Oasis production. - Imports and copies of imports.
bibl.seg: Aurélia Masson, Persian and Ptolemaic Ceramics from Karnak: Change and Continuity.
Cahiers de la céramique égyptienne 9 (2011) pp. 269-310, 116 figg.

Common elements of both periods in the local pottery. - Some characteristics of Late Period ceramics (local production). - Some characteristics of the Ptolemaic ceramics (local productions). - The Oasis production. - Imports and copies of imports.
